entries.message:
MNT completed 
all tie downs removed from er1-q8.sjc1. Tiedown are now to be configured on ds1/ds2-q8.sjc2. new er1/er2-q2.sjc2 was turn up on the network via BGP to DS1/ds2-q8.sjc2

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Silicon Valley1 location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2021-09-21 11:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2021-09-21 15:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Silicon Valley instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.
